text: @Vosh68 can't wait to get the new MP54s in the bag. Love the demo video. They look amazing.

text: @Vosh68 many thanks for your feedback. Just ordered the 53s. Now I'll compare with my 64s and 59s!

text: @Vosh68 love the look of the entire MP line. Will I sacrifice much if I stick with 53 instead of 825Pro?

name: John Seifert
text: @Vosh68 what type of golfer is the MP53 iron targeted to?

text: @patgossnugolf Been a member at Butler since 1975. Thrilled to see your tweet. Love your teaching of @LukeDonald

text: @LukeDonald how long is your driver and why?

name: John Seifert
text: @LukeDonald Don't sweat the twitter mistake. You're a first class professional and a joy to follow. Keep it up!
